pages.text: A $(item)Conduit$() is a beacon-like block that provides $(thing)Conduit Power$() and attacks hostile mobs underwater. $(br2)The $(thing)Conduit Power$() effect restores oxygen, gives underwater night vision and increases mining speed.

To activate, a $(item)Conduit$() needs to be in the center of a 3×3×3 volume of $(item)Water$(), which itself must be enclosed within an activation frame. $(br2)Only $(item)Prismarine$(), $(item)Dark Prismarine$(), $(item)Prismarine Bricks$(), and $(item)Sea Lantern$() blocks in the frame contribute to activation. $(br)These blocks can be found in $(thing)Ocean Monuments$().

pages.name: Conduit Activation Frame
pages.text: This frame can be extended with additional blocks for better effects.
